paragraphs: The 3260B Precision Magnetics Analyzer is a instrument designed for the comprehensive characterization of components, particularly suited to the needs of telecom transformer testing and SMD inductor evaluation. Offering a wide frequency range of 20 Hz to 3 MHz and a basic accuracy of 0.1%, it facilitates precise analysis of a component's performance under various operating conditions including different frequencies, AC drive levels, and DC bias currents.

features.title: Wide Frequency Range
features.description: 20 Hz to 3MHz allows for detailed component analysis across a broad spectrum of frequencies

features.title: High Precision
features.description: 0.1% basic accuracy ensures reliable measurement results

features.title: Versatile Measurement Functions
features.description: Capable of measuring Z, L, C, Rac, Ø, Q, D, Rdc, and Turns Ratio

features.title: Graphical Analysis
features.description: Graph measured parameters against frequency, AC drive level, or DC bias current for thorough component evaluation

features.title: Internal and External DC Bias
features.description: Internal bias up to 1A; external bias up to 250A with optional 3265B DC Bias Units, enabling tests on components requiring high current

features.title: Bin Handler Mode
features.description: Sort components into up to 10 bins based on absolute values or percentage, enhancing production efficiency

features.title: Print and Archive Results
features.description: Direct printing of test results via parallel Centronics interface for analysis and archiving

features.title: PC Control and Analysis
features.description: IEEE 488 GPIB interface and LabVIEW™ driver support for control and data analysis via a PC

specifications.heading: Measurement Function
content: L, Z, Rdc, C, Q, D, Rac, Angle

specifications.heading: Drive Level
content: 1 mV to 10 V rms into open circuit
50 µA to 200 mA rms into short circuit

specifications.heading: Insulation (Option)
content: Test voltages 100 V, 200 V, or 500 V DC, user selectable

specifications.heading: Input Specification
content: Power supply 230 V AC ±10% or 115 V AC ±10% (selectable)

specifications.heading: Display
content: High contrast monochrome LCD 320 x 240 dot with CFL back lighting

specifications.heading: Measurement Connections
content: 2- or 4-wire (Kelvin) measurements with screen at ground potential
Separate terminals for primary and secondary connections
